import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from"swiper/react";import SwiperCore,{Navigation,Pagination,Keyboard}from"swiper/core";import"swiper/swiper-bundle.css";import"swiper/swiper.min.css";import Json from"../portfolio.json";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";SwiperCore.use([Navigation,Pagination,Keyboard]);function importAll(r){return r.keys().map(r);}const images=importAll(require.context('../images/sliders',false,/\.(png|jpe?g|svg|webp)$/));export default function FullScreenSwiper(_ref){let{index}=_ref;const[swiper,setSwiper]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const portfolioFullScreenBlock=document.querySelector('.portfolio-fullscreen');let portfolioBottomSlides=document.querySelectorAll(".portfolio-bottom-slide-".concat(index));portfolioBottomSlides.forEach(bottomSlide=>{bottomSlide.addEventListener('click',function(){portfolioFullScreenBlock.classList.add('portfolio-fullscreen_visible');portfolioFullScreenBlock.querySelector("#portfolio-fullscreen-slider-".concat(index)).classList.add('portfolio-fullscreen-slider_visible');document.body.style.overflow='hidden';let numbers=this.id.match(/[0-9]+-[0-9]+/);numbers=numbers.toString();let x=parseInt(numbers.slice(numbers.indexOf('-')+1));if(swiper){swiper.slideTo(x,0);}// swiper.slideTo
